definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals
to bear hardships and work hard (idiom); assiduous and long-suffering/hard-working and capable of overcoming adversity

sentences.english: Her success in polities stems from hard work and intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 她政治上的成功來自刻苦和智慧。

sentences.english: Now that the exam is near, the students are really going at their studies.
sentences.chinese: 考期臨近了，所以學生們確實在刻苦鑽研。

sentences.english: His family was very poor, but he worked hard at his studies even in early childhood.
sentences.chinese: 孔子的家裏很窮，但是他從小就認真讀書，刻苦學習。

sentences.english: She is digging away at her mathematics lessons.
sentences.chinese: 她在不停地刻苦鑽研數學。

sentences.english: The old lady has practised a lot at drawing and she is now a famous painter.
sentences.chinese: 這位老婦人刻苦練習繪畫，她現在是一名著名畫家了。

sentences.english: I believe that if I am hard-working, my dream will come true.
sentences.chinese: 我相信如果我刻苦努力，我的夢想將會實現。

sentences.english: They stressed that we must destroy the spirit of hard work.
sentences.chinese: 一定要毀掉他們強調過的刻苦耐勞精神。

sentences.english: The desire to win glory for their country impels the athletes to train diligently.
sentences.chinese: 爲國爭光的志願激勵運動員刻苦訓練。

sentences.english: Is it such a fast that I have chosen?
sentences.chinese: 這樣禁食，豈是我所揀選使人刻苦己心的日子嗎。

sentences.english: He practices ice hockey hard, nobody knows how many hockey blades he has worn out.
sentences.chinese: 刻苦練習冰球，不知用壞了多少球刀。

sentences.english: and she's a very hard worker.
I believed after the assiduous endeavor, I able to speak english fluently.
sentences.chinese: 我相信經過刻苦的努力，我的英語說的非常流利。

sentences.english: A hard students learning English, eventually success.
sentences.chinese: 某學生刻苦學習英語，終有小成。

sentences.english: She said that she would dig at American literature for her exam next year.
sentences.chinese: 她說她一定要刻苦鑽研美國文學以應付明年的考試。

sentences.english: Tom fagged (away) at German for two years.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆刻苦地學了兩年德語。

sentences.english: I've been noticing you study hard.
sentences.chinese: 我一直都發現你學習很刻苦。

definition: diligent/industrious (in one's studies)/to study hard/to make great effort
to train hard/to practice diligently/hard work/blood, sweat, and tears
to make an effort/to push for sth/to work hard
